smoothies.name: Berry Bliss
smoothies.description: A refreshing blend of strawberries, blueberries, and raspberries with a hint of honey.

smoothies.name: Tropical Twist
smoothies.description: A delicious mix of mango, pineapple, and coconut water for a tropical vibe.

smoothies.name: Green Detox
smoothies.description: Packed with spinach, kale, banana, and a touch of ginger for a healthy boost.

smoothies.name: Peachy Protein
smoothies.description: A creamy blend of peaches, Greek yogurt, and protein powder for post-workout fuel.

smoothies.name: Chocolate Banana Boost
smoothies.description: Rich cocoa with bananas and peanut butter for a sweet energy boost.

smoothies.name: Citrus Sunrise
smoothies.description: A tangy mix of oranges, carrots, and turmeric for an immune-boosting start to your day.

smoothies.name: Avocado Dream
smoothies.description: Creamy avocado blended with coconut milk and dates for a rich, satisfying smoothie.

smoothies.name: Watermelon Refresh
smoothies.description: A hydrating blend of watermelon, lime, and mint for a refreshing experience.

smoothies.name: Blueberry Oatmeal
smoothies.description: A hearty mix of blueberries, oats, and almond milk for a filling smoothie.

smoothies.name: Coconut Matcha
smoothies.description: A smooth, energizing mix of matcha green tea and coconut milk.
